--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Hey, guys. Sorry I couldn't post today. My computer is on its 
deathbed here, and I've been trying to get an old laptop set up so I 
can post. I'm on for only a second right now, but I'll be posting 
starting tomorrow :-)
> 
> The hard drive damage made a big streak over my /usr partition, 
where most of the software is located on a Linux system, so my 
browser was crippled, along with quite alot of my instant messenger 
and other programs.
